title: Shop Bug........
body:
I buyed today a skin for katarina,PROJECT Katarina.After I buyed it nothing happened and I don't have the skin!!!! I restarted LoL and nothing happened.I want my RP back! Plus the RP (that the skin costs) disappeared.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: If this is the account your posting from, I wasn't able to see any transactions related to that.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look.  We'll reply back asap!
Please Rito I payed much for that rp.........
